Played CS back in the days when it was still 1.0 before going on Retail. CS:GO has everything the old CS used to deliver and more. The old school maps such as Inferno, Dust, Nuke etc. are beautified and so are weapon skins and models. Development has shown it's power throughout all those years. Great Game. I'm hooked again after not touching CS since the new engine came out.
